channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
It says it cannopt find the path when i compile, do i need to edit anything ?
@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_13/bin/javac.exe" *.java pause

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

spoonfeed time:

click the vista sign.

click computer.

click local disc C.

click program files.

click java.

the jdk1.6.0_14 is what i have, the _## is what yours is

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

in the compiler change the 13 to your jdk number the latest update was 22 so if you java is fully updated it should be 22

@echo off
title Compiler
"C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" *.java
pause

like so

to find your java version go to C:Programm Files\Java\JDK1.6.0_** the ** should be the jdk version

Read full topic
